Waltham.Silver Hill station: Silver Hill station is a small MBTA Commuter Rail station in Weston, Massachusetts. One of three stations in Weston, it is a flag stop on the Fitchburg Line, and has very limited service, with just two inbound trains and three outbound trains on weekdays only. It is the second least-used station in the entire MBTA system, with an average of just 15 daily boardings, only behind Plimptonville station on the Franklin Line.
